main: ^Blueberry! Do you have any notes from our last fight?
^Yes, actually. Would you like to hear them?
^Well, I noticed that Strawberry took a little damage that could have been avoided if we had positioned them more defensively.
^Noted. Next time, I'll keep in front of them, so they don't get hurt.
^I can take a little bit of bruising!
good: ^Okay, I think I get it. We'll all try to work on our maneuvering?
^That would be wise, in my opinion.
^Perfect. Where would we be without you, Blueberry?
^(Very clearly running through all the worst case scenarios in their head)
bad: ^Well, it's much easier for me to just protect everyone else.
